title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Gather and analyze requirements for the PlasmaFusionController system, including understanding the physics of plasma confinement, real-time simulation needs, predictive modeling techniques, and system integration requirements.

title: System Architecture Design for PlasmaFusionController
description: Design the overall system architecture for the PlasmaFusionController, including the components for real-time simulation, predictive modeling, control algorithms, system integration, data management, user interfaces, and security considerations. The design should also include scalability, reliability, robustness considerations, performance optimization strategies, and a plan for testing and validation of the architecture. Consider existing solutions in related fields (e.g., simulation and modeling for other complex systems) as inspiration or reference points. Incorporate modularity principles to facilitate future upgrades and expansions, and ensure adherence to best practices in software engineering. Also, provide detailed documentation for each module, including design diagrams and code comments.

title: Real-time Simulation Module Development
description: Develop the real-time simulation module for plasma confinement, including the implementation of physics models, numerical solvers, and integration with the control system.

title: Predictive Modeling Module Development
description: Develop the predictive modeling module for plasma confinement, including the implementation of machine learning algorithms, data preprocessing, and integration with the control system.

title: Control System Development
description: Develop the control system for plasma confinement, including the implementation of control algorithms, real-time data processing, and integration with the simulation and predictive modeling modules.

title: User Interface Development
description: Develop the user interface for the PlasmaFusionController system, including visualization of simulation and predictive modeling results, control parameter configuration, and system monitoring.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement a scalable, performant, secure, and extensible database for storing simulation data, predictive modeling results, and system configurations. The database should be designed with consideration for future integration with other systems, using a microservices architecture approach. Provide documentation for database schema, API endpoints, and performance benchmarks. Consider utilizing NoSQL databases for handling the expected large volumes of data, while maintaining a clear relational model for querying purposes. Ensure data durability and disaster recovery options are implemented, with a focus on shard key selection for distributed data management. Update the task to include a requirement for real-time data streaming capabilities and automated backups. Provide guidelines for database access controls, considering both internal and external stakeholders. Consider using containerization technologies like Docker for deployment and orchestration.

title: System Integration and Testing
description: Integrate all components of the PlasmaFusionController system, including the real-time simulation, predictive modeling, control system, user interface, and database. Perform comprehensive testing to ensure system functionality and performance.

title: Security Audit and Hardening
description: Perform a security audit of the PlasmaFusionController system, identify potential vulnerabilities, and implement necessary security hardening measures.

title: Deployment and Maintenance Planning
description: Plan for the deployment of the PlasmaFusionController system in production environments, including infrastructure provisioning, monitoring, maintenance procedures, rollback strategies, disaster recovery plans, and considerations for scaling to accommodate future needs.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the PlasmaFusionController system, including user manuals, technical specifications, and developer guides. Develop training materials and conduct training sessions for end-users and maintenance personnel.
